name: points
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool live_golf_data.
Tool description: PGA Tour and LIV Tour live golf data for your application needs such as rankings, leaderboards, scorecards, and results.
API description: Fetch official FedExCup points earned per player for a given `tournId` and `year`. Note that PGA Tour non-members will not be officially ranked.

tournid.description: The tournament ID for which to fetch the points.

year.description: The year for which to fetch the points.
